response.body:
[
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "3 parts Brandy",
            "2 parts Yellow Chartreuse",
            "1 part Lillet",
            "1 part Orange Juice",
            "1 part Dubonnet"
        ],
        "instructions": "Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.",
        "name": "four score"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "3.5 cl (7 parts) gin",
            "2 cl (4 parts) apricot brandy",
            "1.5 cl (3 parts) orange juice"
        ],
        "instructions": "Shake together over ice.  Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.",
        "name": "paradise"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "3 parts Brandy",
            "2 parts Yellow Chartreuse",
            "1 part Lillet",
            "1 part Orange Juice",
            "1 part Dubonnet"
        ],
        "instructions": "Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.",
        "name": "savoy affair"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "3 parts Brandy",
            "2 parts Yellow Chartreuse",
            "1 part Lillet",
            "1 part Orange Juice",
            "1 part Dubonnet"
        ],
        "instructions": "Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.",
        "name": "savoy corpse reviver"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "3 parts Brandy",
            "2 parts Yellow Chartreuse",
            "1 part Lillet",
            "1 part Orange Juice",
            "1 part Dubonnet"
        ],
        "instructions": "Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.",
        "name": "the blenheim"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "52.5 ml dry gin",
            "22.5 ml lemon juice",
            "22.5 ml orange juice",
            "2 teaspoons honey syrup"
        ],
        "instructions": "Stir honey syrup with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass",
        "name": "bee's knees"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "1 oz Gin",
            "1 oz Sweet vermouth",
            "1 oz Herbal liqueur, Green Chartreuse",
            "1 ds Orange bitters",
            "1  Maraschino cherry (as garnish)"
        ],
        "instructions": "Stir, strain, straight up, cocktail glass, garnish.",
        "name": "bijou"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "3 cl (6 parts) Gin",
            "1.5 cl (3 parts) Sweet Red Vermouth",
            "1 cl (2 parts) Dry Vermouth",
            "1.5 cl (3 parts) Orange juice"
        ],
        "instructions": "Pour into cocktail shaker all ingredients with ice cubes, shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail or martini glass.",
        "name": "bronx"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "2 oz Old Tom Gin",
            "2 ds Lemon juice",
            "2 ds Maraschino Liqueur",
            "2 ds Orange bitters",
            "1  Cherry (as garnish)"
        ],
        "instructions": "Shake with ice, strain into glass.",
        "name": "casino"
    },
    {
        "ingredients": [
            "1 measure gin",
            "1/2 measure sweet vermouth",
            "1/2 measure orange juice",
            "1/4 measure orange curacao or triple sec"
        ],
        "instructions": "Shake with ice and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass",
        "name": "damn the weather"
    }
]
